column1: Mrs. Malani Lokupothagama expressed her gratitude for health sector, security forces, other government officials and the general public, who helped to control the coronavirus in the Ratnapura district.@MoH_SriLanka @srilanka_navy @Sri_Lanka_Army #SriLanka https://sinhala.news.lk/news/political-current-affairs/item/38461-2020-05-30-16-38-43
